topics.body:
I had a very weird but at the same time, pretty mild dream.

I was dreaming of a fried stirred egg.
That's it.

It was portrayed in the form of a McDonald's commercial. It had crispy edges, soft middle areas and was yellow-white to perfection. It had delicious imported spices on it and eating the egg alone was enough.
